meaning: The Spotify ID of the playlist
The Spotify ID for the track
The duration of the track in milliseconds
A comma-separated list for the Spotify ID of the artists. (It can be multiple artists in one tracks)
A comma-separated list of artists name
A comma-separated list of the Spotify IDs for the albums
"The popularity of the track. The value will be between 0 and 100

column name: The popularity of a track is a value between 0 and 100
data type: with 100 being the most popular. The popularity is calculated by algorithm and is based
example: on the total number of plays the track has had and how recent those plays are.

data type: songs that are being played a lot now will have a higher popularity than songs that were played a lot in the past. Duplicate tracks (e.g. the same track from a single and an album) are rated independently. Artist and album popularity is derived mathematically from track popularity. Note that the popularity value may lag actual popularity by a few days: the value is not updated in real time"
